StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DeleteNWA]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
DECLARE @SSN char(9)
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
--- GET THE APPLICANT'S SSN SELECT @SSN = P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.NWA_ID = @NWAID)
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN --- DELETE CANDIDATE STATUS RECORDS IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN --- UPDATE THE APPLICANT'S CANDIDATE_STATUS RECORDS WITH THE USER LOGIN AND CURRENT DATE/TIME --- BEFORE DELETING UPDATE CANDIDATE_STATUS SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
DECLARE @StatusRecordCount int SELECT @StatusRecordCount = COUNT(CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS WHERE CS.NWA_ID = @NWAID
DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
--- CHECK FOR ERRORS AND VERIFY THE NUMBER OF RECORDS DELETED IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT != @StatusRecordCount BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred deletIng the Status/Disposi.on record(s) for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
--- DELETE MEPS SCHEDULE RECORDS IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MEPS_SCHEDULE WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN --- UPDATE THE APPLICANT'S CANDIDATE_STATUS RECORDS WITH THE USER LOGIN AND CURRENT DATE/TIME --- BEFORE DELETING UPDATE MEPS_SCHEDULE SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
DECLARE @MEPSScheduleRecordCount int SELECT @MEPSScheduleRecordCount = COUNT(MS.SCHEDULE_ID) FROM MEPS_SCHEDULE MS WHERE MS.NWA_ID = @NWAID
DELETE FROM MEPS_SCHEDULE WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
--- CHECK FOR ERRORS AND VERIFY THE NUMBER OF RECORDS DELETED IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT != @MEPSScheduleRecordCount BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred deletIng the MEPS Schedule record(s) for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
--- DELETE WAIVER RECORDS IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN --- UPDATE THE APPLICANT'S CANDIDATE_STATUS RECORDS WITH THE USER LOGIN AND CURRENT DATE/TIME --- BEFORE DELETING UPDATE CANDIDATE_WAIVER SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
DECLARE @WaiverCount int SELECT @WaiverCount = COUNT(CW.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER CW WHERE CW.NWA_ID = @NWAID
DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
--- CHECK FOR ERRORS AND VERIFY THE NUMBER OF RECORDS DELETED IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT != @WaiverCount BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred deletIng the Waiver record(s) for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 3, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
--- UPDATE THE APPLICANT'S NWA RECORD WITH THE USER LOGIN AND CURRENT DATE/TIME --- BEFORE DELETING UPDATE NWA SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
--- DELETE THE NWA RECORD DELETE FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT != 1 BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred deletIng the NWA record for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 4, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
